verses.name: Isaiah 3:12
verses.text: As for my people, children are their oppressors, and women rule over them. O my people, they which lead thee cause thee to err, and destroy the way of thy paths.

verses.name: Isaiah 3:13
verses.text: The Lord standeth up to plead, and standeth to judge the people.

verses.name: Isaiah 3:14
verses.text: The Lord will enter into judgment with the ancients of his people, and the princes thereof: for ye have eaten up the vineyard; the spoil of the poor is in your houses.

verses.name: Isaiah 3:15
verses.text: What mean ye that ye beat my people to pieces, and grind the faces of the poor? saith the Lord God of hosts.
